name: Text Input for GB Studio
description:
A text input for GB Studio. I tried to make it as non-intrusive as possible so it can be integrated into games. It requires an individual variable for each character in each name, so you may want to use it sparingly!

Feel free to use in your projects, no need to credit me, but I'd like a link to the finished product if possible. 

Update v1c: Fixed some stray code that caused problems when importing into other projects

Update v1b: Minor bug fix
